title.value: A Distributed Data-Parallel PyTorch Implementation of the Distributed Shampoo Optimizer for Training Neural Networks At-Scale
title.justification: The title is taken directly from the paper, providing an accurate and concise description of the study.
title.quote: A Distributed Data-Parallel PyTorch Implementation of the Distributed Shampoo Optimizer for Training Neural Networks At-Scale

extractions.description: The paper describes a PyTorch implementation of the Distributed Shampoo algorithm for training neural networks at scale. This implementation is optimized for homogeneous GPU architectures and enables efficient multi-GPU distributed data-parallel training.

type.justification: The paper includes empirical evaluations such as ablation studies and performance benchmarks on training ImageNet with ResNet50.
type.quote: We validate our implementation by performing an ablation study on training ImageNet ResNet50

name.justification: The research focuses on the implementation and optimization of a deep learning optimizer for training neural networks.
name.quote: Shampoo is an online and stochastic optimization algorithm belonging to the AdaGrad family of methods for training neural networks.

name.justification: The main contribution of the paper is in the field of optimizing neural network training using the Distributed Shampoo optimizer.
name.quote: The contribution of this paper is the description and design of a PyTorch implementation of the Distributed Shampoo algorithm.

name.justification: The ResNet50 model is used for evaluating the performance of the Distributed Shampoo implementation.
name.quote: We validate our implementation by performing an ablation study on training ImageNet ResNet50

name.justification: The ImageNet dataset is used for training the ResNet50 model to validate the Distributed Shampoo implementation.
name.quote: We validate our implementation by performing an ablation study on training ImageNet ResNet50

name.justification: The Distributed Shampoo implementation is specifically designed for the PyTorch framework.
name.quote: A Distributed Data-Parallel PyTorch Implementation of the Distributed Shampoo Optimizer for Training Neural Networks At-Scale
